main.name: Philip Salvacion
main.description: I am a web developer and I use ReactJs with Material UI or Bootstrap 4 to develop front-end pages, PHP for server-side scripting, and MySQL for database management
main.bio: Hi, my name is Philip! I'm a web developer with a special focus in ReactJS, Bootstrap 4, Javascript, PHP, and MySQL. Along with my 2 years of freelance experience, I recently graduated with my Bachelor's degree in Information Technology from Cavite State University.
main.contactmessage: For project offers or inquiries kindly contact me at my email or phone number.

education.description: This course develops students' skills in diagnosis and troubleshooting of computer systems, as well as in the performance of computer operations. While taking this course, I got 3 academic excellence award, and 1 gold medal for conduct excellence.
